content: Hello, we've just started looking at how we would expose FHIR CodeSystem in front of a terminology provider we are using. The properties that relate to a CodeSystem are coded. Is there any initiative to get some consistent codes in place for the properties that many of the standard terminologies provide?
Each terminology tends to define their own properties and we don't have a lot of ability to influence how externa code systems are defined
we have some common properties defined. we can add more if there's consistent themes. What properties do you have?
